item.title: Mattress Dumped on corner of Queens Close Hucclecote, 5th January
item.description:
A single mattress has been dumped on the corner of Queens Close, Hucclecote near the Hillview School. There is currently no other rubbish. This is an on going issue. A few years a sign was put up but this has now gone. A camera to catch the person doing this regularly would be fantastic. If it is small enough to go into my bin I clear it myself but I am unable to do this with this mattress. This is the second fly tip in a month, a TV was dumped earlier in December. This mattress has been here for about a week, posts on social media to ask the fly tipper to remove have been unsuccessful
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillview Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Flytipping (not witnessed and no evidence likely)

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 5th January
item.description:
Customer reports that the traffic management for the location needs to be reviewed immediately: the road closure sign is halfway down Salter's Lane/Hailes on Hill, instead of at the top where vehicles enter the road. They also state that Salter's Lane/Hailes on Hill is unsuitable as a diversion, as it is iced up and not accessible; a van has failed to traverse this already. They add that Hailes on Hill/Slater's Lane also needs to be gritted.
Report on FixMyStreet
